document.full_text: samsung electronics has asked a u.s. court to force apple inc to hand over its next-generation models of the iphone and ipad in the latest volley in a series of patent infringement suits between the two technology companies.
document.title: samsung asks court for next-gen iphone and ipad
lines_and_colors: samsung electronics has asked a u.s. court to force apple inc to hand over its next-generation models of the iphone and ipad in the latest volley in a series of patent infringement suits between the two technology companies.
